name: GetCampaignDetails
description:
Retrieve details of a specific marketing campaign.

Use this tool to get detailed information about a specific campaign using its ID. It provides insights and data related to that campaign.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the campaign to retrieve details about.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign.

parameters.name: fields_to_return
parameters.description: Specify a comma-separated list of fields to return, using dot notation for sub-object parameters.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: fields_to_exclude
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: include_resend_shortcut_eligibility
parameters.description: Include the `resend_shortcut_eligibility` field in the response to check if the campaign is eligible for Campaign Resend Shortcuts.

value_schema.description: Return the `resend_shortcut_eligibility` field in the response, which tells you if the campaign is eligible for the various Campaign Resend Shortcuts offered.

parameters.name: include_resend_shortcut_usage
parameters.description: Include this to receive the `resend_shortcut_usage` field, providing details about campaigns related by a shortcut.

value_schema.description: Return the `resend_shortcut_usage` field in the response.  This includes information about campaigns related by a shortcut.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: include_resend_shortcut_eligibility
parameters.description: Return the `resend_shortcut_eligibility` field in the response, which tells you if the campaign is eligible for the various Campaign Resend Shortcuts offered.

value_schema.description: Return the `resend_shortcut_eligibility` field in the response, which tells you if the campaign is eligible for the various Campaign Resend Shortcuts offered.

parameters.name: include_resend_shortcut_usage
parameters.description: Return the `resend_shortcut_usage` field in the response.  This includes information about campaigns related by a shortcut.

value_schema.description: Return the `resend_shortcut_usage` field in the response.  This includes information about campaigns related by a shortcut.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the campaign.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
